mil5.3.11:5.5: Niggaho nāma, bhante nāgasena, hatthacchedo pādacchedo vadho bandhanaṃ kāraṇā māraṇaṃ santativikopanaṃ, na etaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato yuttaṃ, na ca bhagavā arahati etaṃ vacanaṃ vattuṃ.
mil5.3.11:5.7: ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti, tena hi ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.
mil5.3.11:5.9: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, tena hi ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.
mil5.3.11:5.10: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:6.2: ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti, bhaṇitañca—
mil5.3.11:6.4: ‘Ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti sabbesaṃ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṃ anumataṃ etaṃ, esā anusiṭṭhi, esā dhammadesanā, dhammo hi, mahārāja, ahiṃsālakkhaṇo, sabhāvavacanaṃ etaṃ.
mil5.3.11:6.6: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, bhāsā esā, uddhataṃ, mahārāja, cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, līnaṃ cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ.
mil5.3.11:6.7: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, kusalaṃ cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ.
mil5.3.11:6.8: Ayoniso manasikāro niggahetabbo, yoniso manasikāro paggahetabbo.
mil5.3.11:7.1: “Hotu, bhante nāgasena, idāni tvaṃ paccāgatosi mama visayaṃ, yamahaṃ pucchāmi, so me attho upagato.
mil5.3.11:7.2: Coro pana, bhante nāgasena, niggaṇhantena kathaṃ niggahetabbo”ti?
mil5.3.11:7.3: “Coro, mahārāja, niggaṇhantena evaṃ niggahetabbo, paribhāsanīyo paribhāsitabbo, daṇḍanīyo daṇḍetabbo, pabbājanīyo pabbājetabbo, bandhanīyo bandhitabbo, ghātanīyo ghātetabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:7.4: “Yaṃ pana, bhante nāgasena, corānaṃ ghātanaṃ, taṃ tathāgatānaṃ anumatan”ti?
mil5.3.11:7.7: “Yo so, mahārāja, ghātīyati, na so tathāgatānaṃ anumatiyā ghātīyati, sayaṃkatena so ghātīyati, api ca dhammānusiṭṭhiyā anusāsīyati, sakkā pana, mahārāja, tayā purisaṃ akārakaṃ anaparādhaṃ vīthiyaṃ carantaṃ gahetvā ghātayitun”ti?
mil5.3.11:7.11: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, na coro tathāgatānaṃ anumatiyā haññati, sayaṃkatena so haññati, kiṃ panettha anusāsako kiñci dosaṃ āpajjatī”ti?
mil5.3.11:7.13: “Tena hi, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṃ anusiṭṭhi sammānusiṭṭhi hotī”ti.
